body.name: Jelymark Shag Moroccan Area Rug for Living Room, 4x6 Feet Modern Geometric Rug, Fluffy Distressed Faux Wool Floor Carpet, Memory Foam Rug for Bedroom Nursery Kids Room Home Decor, Light Grey/White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Attention】 Because of the distressed design and the special material, the rug will have indentation after pressing. After vacuum package and transportation, the rug may have crease and not fluffy, please tease the rug and spread the memory foam rug flat on floor, area rug will recover flat in 2-3 days. If you have any question, please contact us, we will reply within 24 hours

【Premium Non-Shedding Faux Wool Rug】The Shag Area Rug features a top layer of dense and non-shedding faux wool fur, soft and comfort fuzzy rug, not easy to shed and durable for last long use. Memory foam in the carpet middle layer, increase the rugs thickness and cushion, fluffy rug keep you and your children, pets from cold and hard floor

【Anti-Slip Rubber Backing Rugs】 The rubber backing of area rug features with thousands of non slip grip rubber dots, which help the non slip rug stay in place, not easy to slip, is an ideal indoor area rug for families, kids, toddler, pets to play or relax

【Washable Area Rug】 The room rug is made with durable short faux fur. Don't worry about the fur shed or not fluffy after cleaning. For a simple clean: vacuum carpet with a hand-held small vacuum. For a deep clean, the throw rug is machine washable. Please put the soft rug in laundry bag when machine washing, then put it flat and air dry the faux wool carpet rug. Please use a mild detergent. Do Not Use Chlorine Or Bleach

【Elegant Classic Geometric Design Rug】 Beautiful geometric designs modern rug with coordinated color matching, the aesthetic rug can brighten up any home room.Suitable for variety of home styles such as modern, Moroccan, retro, vintage, preppy, is a perfect home decoration accent rug

【Perfect for Any Room Decor Rug】 The shaggy carpets are available in small or large size rugs, perfect for various rooms such as indoor room, living rooms, bedrooms, nursery room, kid's room, baby's room, girl's room, boy's room, college student dorm room, master room, bedside, playroom, classroom, hallway, kitchen, dining room, laundry, apartment, home offices. Fluffy carpet is a nice gift to give for families, kids, boys, girls, parents, friends and students
body.description: Jelymark Moroccan geometry rug with a luxurious look, classic and timeless, suitable for a variety of rooms. Premium material, durable and not easy to shed or fade. Is a perfect home decoration carpet Three-layer Structure Design The throw carpet features fuzzy and dense faux wool fur surface, thick and comfortable memory foam inter-layer, thousands of non slip grip dots rubber backing Various Color and Size Rug Perfect for Any Room 3x5 feet small area rug: suitable for kids room,nursery room, baby's room, girl's room, boy's room, college student dorm room, hallway, kitchen, laundry 4x6 feet/5x8 feet/6x9 feet large area rug: suitable for living room, bedrooms, kids room,nursery room, baby's room, girl's room, boy's room, college student dorm room, bedside, playroom, dining room, classroom, apartment, home offices Machine Washable Carpet The room rug is made with durable short faux fur. Don't worry about the fur shed or not fluffy after cleaning. Please put the soft rug in laundry bag when machine washing, then put it flat and air dry the faux fur carpet rugs. Please use a mild detergent, Do Not Use Chlorine Or Bleach Package Includes Area Rug x1 Packing Vacuum packing of plastic bag Notes 1. Do not iron 2. Do not use on wet floors 3. Please use a low-power vacuum cleaner or wash with a mild detergent 4. Put it flat in a ventilated place for 1-2 days to recover flat and fluffy 5. The carpet is machine washable，but for last long use, it is not recommended to wash the shaggy rug too frequently, because machine wash is always too violent for the soft carpets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: For around 50 dollars, this rug is fantastic. It comes vacuum wrapped so be ready for it to look thin and very cheap when you open it. However, within 2 days it becomes thick and soft. Bonus for having a non-slip bottom on it as well which saves you money over other budget rugs by not having to buy a rug pad. Instructions also state it is machine washable but I haven't tested that yet. I told my wife we should order an extra for when this one wears out because we like it so much. I wish they made larger sizes! Would love an 8x10 just like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft with a little "sponge foam" for your feet
reviews.reviewText: I can see why this is listed as a rug for a nursery - it is soft, does not shed, and is washable. I can imagine a little one crawling around, drooling, rolling over on this rug. I wish I had this when I was having babies. However, I am old now and needed a wall-to-wall rug in my bathroom that wouldn't slip. I needed to cut it to size obviously to fit around the toilet, floor vent, etc. It was very easy to cut with regular scissors. It does shed a bit along the cut edges after cutting, but I vacummed and then ran a sticky roller over the edges to pick up any fluff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Cheap, thin rugs, gave them 4 stars because they are perfect for our dog to sleep on. Very thin and the gray color is odd, has a greenish hue. Anyway the price was great. Easy to clean, throw in the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug is soft but is cheaply made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect. I am using it in my office, and it super soft, and beautiful colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a rug
reviews.reviewText: This came true to size and color, its beautiful and soft...However, it is NOT a rug. This is an oversized bath mat. That's the material. I was expecting a rug. For that reason only it's 3 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and very soft.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my piano.The size is perfect fit.It's very soft and the color is beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars kind of like a bath mat
reviews.reviewText: Got this rug to use in our basement to bring some warmth to our cat room. It is sooooo soft! Its pretty much like a big memory foam bath mat. I have not cleaned it yet so can't speak to how it holds up as far as washing or vacuuming. But it super nice to be able to sweep the cat litter right off it.
